author: davsclaus
msg: Sorry that should have waited for Camel 3.0 as there may be Camel end users that has outputs inside the marshal and unmarhsal tags in XML DSL.

author: sf
msg: Code cleanup:
1) use apr_palloc instead of apr_pcalloc when all the fields of the allocated
structure are set afterwards.
2) avoid useless calls to 'strcasecmp' when we have already found what we are
looking for.
Submitted by: Christophe JAILLET <christophe jaillet wanadoo fr>

author: rjung
msg: Remove superfluous quotes from thread names for
connection pools.
Example broken thread name: "http-apr-8001"-exec-2
(including leading and intermediate quotes).
Since we never use the names as a full ObjectName,
only as a part of an ObjectName, it is safe to
remove the surrounding quotes from the Protocol name.

author: davsclaus
msg: Bean model should not support output, as its like like a ProcessorRef. Marked ref attribute as @deprecated on marshal/unmarshal.

author: hwright
msg: Add logging, and hide output from building autoconf, libtool, and swig in
release.py.  Add a --verbose switch to enable this output if requested.
* tools/dist/release.py
(get_nullfile): New.
(run_script): Only optionally display output from running subcommands.
(build_env): Add some logging, and update calls to run_script().
(main): Add --verbose switch, and set up logging.
